places_with_reviews.name: bassi uttar pradesh near siyana
places_with_reviews.address: Bassi barah, near siyana, Basti Khas, Basti, Uttar Pradesh 272002, India

reviews.text: This is very calm place and so much greenery .People don't about this place but it's really awesome and fantastic one.Even the place called Maya called that in old time people hidden their gold in that place but none is able to get as there are many snakes and all.But i don't know the entire fact i just can say it was very horrible one.if you wanna visit this place then let me know because hotels n all not available at this place it's a village but the public of that place very supportive and cooperative.Once you must vist this place.and for any query ask .Thank you.

places_with_reviews.name: Gayatri Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: Roadways Tiraha, RP2X+28W, Gandhi Nagar, Basti, Uttar Pradesh 272001, India

reviews.text:
In Basti, This Temple is very Beautiful and peace full place. You can visit here any time and pray with Gayatri Mata.

Here you can also buy devotional items at very reasonable price.

Net and Clean place.

Near Bus Station of basti.

It's been a great place with mesmerizing environment and lovely architecture..a place with a lovely temple inside..big god structure and fun park..must visit
The Gayatri temple, which appears to be the source of its power, where one can see the form of the devi or according to the devotee, where all the desires of the heart are fulfilled.

It is superb place . Everybody have to go there. Here is a shop where you can guy all goods for pooja and many people does marry here. At the second floor there is hall and many rooms many people married from here so this is good place. Friends like to banta hai.....
Lovely Mandir. I regularly visit this Mandir.

Worship place and available all types goods for worshipped and daily uses.
Eantry available any time during the day or evening if you want to stay with your family nearby available hotel.
